article_title: Yes, Congress Wanted Obamacare Subsidies. It Just Did A Terrible Job Of Saying That.

article_metadata.description: A Republican staffer who was present at the creation says Congress wanted subsidies, but did a terrible job of putting that into law.
article_metadata.author: Daniel Fisher
